text:
Bro, you are God. How can someone be so good in everything. I've learned a lot from you and will still learn. me bohot khushkismet hu jo tere jesaa dost paya bro. I don't how I can repay you all the selfless help provided by you every time. bhai vo gym wale din and mth me exams hamesha yaad rahenge, mere doubts clear karne ke liye shukriya.

Bro, I really want to meet you soon till then I can only say thank you and love you brother.
author: Ayush  Bhorse
